title: Home
description: This blog post will guide you through the process of rendering React components using Go. We'll start by setting up a basic Go server and then integrate it with a React frontend.

head.title: Go React SSR: Build Server-Side Rendered Apps
head.description: Learn to build server-side rendered applications using Go and React. Step-by-step guide to set up a Go server and integrate it with React for optimal performance.
head.keywords: Go React SSR, Server Side Rendering, React Go Integration, Web Development, Performance Optimization
head.author: daodao97!
